By SYO

###  vector, factor, matrix, list, dataframe

```{r}
# vector
v1 <- c(1, 2, 3)
v1
typeof(v1) # structure, vector, list, ...
mode(v1) # type, numeric, char, ... 

v2 <- c('a', 'b', 'abc')
v2
typeof(v2)
mode(v2)

#factor
f1 <- factor(1, 2, 3) # Error
help(factor)

f1 <- factor(c(1, 2, 3))
f1
typeof(f1)
mode(f1)

m1 <- matrix(1:24, nrow = 3, ncol = 8)
typeof(m1)
mode(m1)

l1 <- list(1, 2, 3) # components as parameters 
l1
typeof(l1)
mode(l1)

l2 <- list(c(1, 2, 3))
l2
l3 <- list(1, c(1, 2, 3), list("a", "b", "c"))
l3

d1 <- data.frame(numbers = c(1, 2, 3), alpha = c("a", "b", "c"), row.names = c(1, 2, 3))
d1
typeof(d1)
mode(d1)

d1$alpha
mode(d1$alpha)
d1[2]
mode(d1[2])
d1[[2]]
mode(d1[[2]])
